{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRT1900AC |revision=v2 |upc=745883598601 |asin=B00IGL3L2E;US; |newegg=N82E16833124531 |serialnum_prefix=13J2 |series=AC1900 |est_release_date=01/08/2015 |fcc_date=03/20/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Wistron NeWeb |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-WRT1900ACV2 |ic_id=3839A-WRT1900ACV2 |pcb_id=48SAM201.SGF |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6820;MV, 88F6820-A0, C160, Armada 385; |cpu1_cspeed=1.3 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G100TFI00 |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G63FFR-PBC |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, USB 2.0 / eSATA (combo port) |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, |serial=yes,, 6-pin header,, (115200,8,N,1),, |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8864 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=3 |wi2_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi2_chip1_model=88W8864 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6176;88E6176-TFJ2; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=USB 3.0 controller;EtronTech;;;1; ,,, 2.4GHz Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;RFMD;RFPA5522;;4; |flags=no fan |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=DD-WRT, OpenWrt, LEDE |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|AC1900 Dual-Band Smart Wi-Fi Wireless Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-WRT1900AC/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRT1900AC|pid=01t80000003KdJ7AAK}} "48SAM201.SGF" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :OEM: [[Wistron NeWeb]] [[Linksys WRT1900AC v2]] - ''Cobra'' *[http://www.linksys.com/ru/support-article?articleNum=156194 Product comparison between ''Linksys WRT1900AC and WRT1900AC v2''] :CPU: [[Marvell]] MV88F6820-A0 C160 @1.33/1.6GHz ([https://fccid.io/Q87-WRT1900ACV2/Internal-Photos/Internal-Photos-2561219 FCC images]) ===Wikis=== *{{WPLink|Linksys_routers#WRT1900AC}} *[https://github.com/Chadster766/McDebian/wiki ''Linksys WRT1900AC'' on the '''McDebian''' Wiki] *[https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt_ac_series On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] :[https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt_ac_series#wrt1900ac WRT1900AC v2] - [[Marvell]] Armada 385 @1.3GHz (Cobra) ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32856-linksys-wrt1900acs-dual-band-gigabit-router-reviewed ''Linksys WRT1900ACS Dual-Band Gigabit Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32393-linksys-wrt1900ac-ac1900-dual-band-wireless-router-review Review ''Linksys WRT1900AC v1'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ([http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32400-linksys-wrt1900ac-review-more-tests + more tests]) *[http://www.linksys.com/ca/support-article?articleNum=143610 ''Getting to know the Linksys WRT1900AC'' on '''Lynksys'''] :[[Linksys WRT1900AC v1]] is powered by a Dual Core @1.2GHz CPU :[[Linksys WRT1900AC v2]] is powered by a Dual-Core @1.3GHz CPU ::CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820; 88F6820-A0 C133 @1.33GHz :Uses a 12V/3A power adapter ===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=50173&p=322 ''Update on Linksys WRT1900AC support'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] (Kaloz) :Support for the WRT1900ACS (Shelby) is available in CC and trunk *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/linksys-wrt-1900acs.27516/ ''Linksys WRT1900ACS'' on '''SNB''' forums] (RMerlin) *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=256298&start=1035 ''Linksys WRT1900AC/Marvell support'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums] :CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820 C160 @1.6GHz, RAM @800MHz 
WRT1900AC v1:

Board: RD-AXP-GP rev 1.0 
SoC:   MV78230 B0 
       running 2 CPUs 
       Custom configuration 
CPU:   Marvell PJ4B (584) v7 (Rev 2) LE 
       CPU 0 
       CPU    @ 1200 [MHz] 
       L2     @ 600 [MHz] 
       TClock @ 250 [MHz] 
       DDR    @ 600 [MHz] 
       DDR 32Bit Width, FastPath Memory Access 
       DDR ECC Disabled 
DRAM:  256 MiB 

WRT1900AC V2:

Board: RD-NAS-88F6820-DDR3 
SoC:   MV88F6820 Rev A0 
       running 2 CPUs 
CPU:   ARM Cortex A9 MPCore (Rev 1) LE 
       CPU 0 
       CPU    @ 1600 [MHz] 
       L2     @ 800 [MHz] 
       TClock @ 200 [MHz] 
       DDR    @ 800 [MHz] 
       DDR 32 Bit Width, FastPath Memory Access, 
            DLB Enabled, ECC Disabled 
DRAM:  512 MiB
See also [[Talk:Linksys WRT1900AC v2]].. ===See also=== [[List of Four Stream Hardware]] *[[Linksys WRT32X]] *[[Linksys WRT3200ACM]] *[[Linksys WRT1900AC v1]] *[[Linksys WRT1900AC v2]] *[[Linksys WRT1900ACS]] *[[Linksys WRT1200AC v1]] *[[Linksys WRT1200AC v2]] __NOTOC__
